text:
James Frederick Bridenstine (born June 15, 1975) is an American politician. Bridenstine is the 13th and current Administrator of NASA since April 2018. He served as the United States Representative for Oklahoma's 1st congressional district, based in Tulsa, from 2013 to 2018. He is a member of the Republican Party.
On September 1, 2017, President Donald Trump nominated Bridenstine to be the next Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
